languages.text: {n}Арджента сердито рубит рукой воздух.{/n} "Варп-шторма — такие же наши враги, как еретики и демоны. Как жаль, что с ними ничего не сделать огнеметом или болтером!"
{n}Argenta angrily chops the air with a side of her palm.{/n} "Warp storms are our enemies, just like heretics and daemons. It is a shame they can't be dispersed with a flamer or a bolter!"
languages.original_text: {n}Арджента сердито рубит рукой воздух.{/n} "Варп-шторма — такие же наши враги, как еретики и демоны. Как жаль, что с ними ничего не сделать огнеметом или болтером!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta angrily chops the air with a side of her palm.{/n} "Warp storms are our enemies, just like the heretics and demons. It is a shame they can't be dispersed with a flamer or a bolter!"
{n}Argenta angrily chops the air with a side of her palm.{/n} "Warp storms are our enemies, just like heretics and daemons. It is a shame they can't be dispersed with a flamer or a bolter!"
{n}Argenta angrily chops the air with a side of her palm.{/n} "Warp storms are our enemies, just like heretics and daemons. It is a shame they can't be dispersed with a flamer or a bolter!"
{n}Argenta angrily chops the air with a side of her palm.{/n} "Warp storms are our enemies, just like heretics and daemons. It is a shame they can't be dispersed with a flamer or a bolter!"

languages.text: {n}Argenta corta el aire con la mano, furiosa.{/n} «Las tormentas de disformidad son nuestro enemigo, al igual que los herejes y los daemons. ¡Pero por desgracia no se pueden disipar con un lanzallamas o un bólter!».
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta angrily chops the air with a side of her palm.{/n} "Warp storms are our enemies, just like heretics and daemons. It is a shame they can't be dispersed with a flamer or a bolter!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta corta el aire con la mano, furiosa.{/n} «Las tormentas de disformidad son nuestro enemigo, al igual que los herejes y los daemons. ¡Pero por desgracia no se pueden disipar con un lanzallamas o un bólter!».

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔用手刀愤怒地劈着空气。{/n}“亚空间风暴和就像异端分子与恶魔一样，也是我们的敌人。真可惜，我们不能用火焰喷射器或爆矢枪把它干掉！”
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta angrily chops the air with a side of her palm.{/n} "Warp storms are our enemies, just like heretics and daemons. It is a shame they can't be dispersed with a flamer or a bolter!"

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔用手刀愤怒地劈着空气。{/n}“亚空间风暴和就像异端分子与恶魔一样，也是我们的敌人。真可惜，我们不能用火焰喷射器或爆矢枪把它干掉！”

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタは怒りに任せて、手のひらで空を切る。{/n}「歪みの嵐は、異端者やディーモンと同様に我らの敵です。フレイマーやボルターで追い払えないのがもどかしい！」
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta angrily chops the air with a side of her palm.{/n} "Warp storms are our enemies, just like heretics and daemons. It is a shame they can't be dispersed with a flamer or a bolter!"

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタは怒りに任せて、手のひらで空を切る。{/n}「歪みの嵐は、異端者やディーモンと同様に我らの敵です。フレイマーやボルターで追い払えないのがもどかしい！」

languages.text: {n}Argenta durchschneidet wütend die Luft mit ihrer Handkante.{/n} "Warpstürme sind unsere Feinde, genau wie Ketzer und Dämonen. Wirklich schade, dass man ihnen nicht mit einem Flammenwerfer oder Bolter auf den Leib rücken kann!"
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta angrily chops the air with a side of her palm.{/n} "Warp storms are our enemies, just like heretics and daemons. It is a shame they can't be dispersed with a flamer or a bolter!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta durchschneidet wütend die Luft mit ihrer Handkante.{/n} "Warpstürme sind unser Feinde, genau wie Ketzer und Dämonen. Wirklich schade, dass man ihnen nicht mit einem Flammenwerfer oder Bolter auf den Leib rücken kann!"

languages.text: {n}Argenta frappe dans le vide avec le tranchant de sa main.{/n} « Les tempêtes Warp sont nos ennemies, au même titre que les hérétiques et les démons. Dommage que l'on ne puisse pas s'en débarrasser à coups de lance-flammes ou de bolter ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta angrily chops the air with a side of her palm.{/n} "Warp storms are our enemies, just like heretics and daemons. It is a shame they can't be dispersed with a flamer or a bolter!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta frappe dans le vide avec le tranchant de sa main.{/n} « Les tempêtes Warp sont nos ennemies, au même titre que les hérétiques et les démons. Dommage que l'on ne puisse pas s'en débarrasser à coups de lance-flammes ou de bolter ! »

languages.text: {n}Argenta, avcunun kenarıyla havayı keser gibi öfkeli bir hareket yapıyor.{/n} "Öteboyut fırtınaları, tıpkı kâfir ve iblisler gibi düşmanımızdır. Yakarak veya vurarak temizleyemiyor oluşumuz çok yazık!"
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta angrily chops the air with a side of her palm.{/n} "Warp storms are our enemies, just like heretics and daemons. It is a shame they can't be dispersed with a flamer or a bolter!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta elinin kenarıyla havayı keser gibi öfkeli bir hareket yapıyor.{/n} "Öteboyut fırtınaları tıpkı kâfirler ve iblisler gibi bizim düşmanımızdır. Yakarak veya vurarak temizleyemiyor oluşumuz çok yazık!"
